imdb.title: Michiko to Hatchin
imdb.plot: Michiko is a free-willed "sexy diva" who escaped from prison, while Hatchin is a run away girl fleeing from her strict catholic foster family. The two join forces and set off on an unpredictable road trip seeking their own freedom.

episodes.title: Farewell Cruel Paradise!
episodes.plot: Hana was constantly tortured by her wretched foster parents and their two hideous children - until a stunning escaped convict changed her life forever!

episodes.title: The Brown Sugar Outlaw
episodes.plot: Michiko tries to gain Hana's trust, but the outlaw's brash behavior - and an attempted ambush by Atsuko - does nothing to set the young girl at ease.

episodes.title: Like a Frantic Pinball
episodes.plot: Hana goes to work into a Chinese restaurant to pay for a pair of stolen shoes. Meanwhile, Michiko scours the town in search of Hiroshi.

episodes.title: Stray Cat Milky Way
episodes.plot: Michiko delves into the seedy underworld of a scandalous nightclub in search information on Hiroshi, but she may have met her match in the form of an exotic dancer.

episodes.title: The Saudade of Fools, Parte 1
episodes.plot: Michiko returns to her home town to track down an old friend of Hiroshi's, but the sins of her past are quick to catch up with her - and a quarrel with Hana only makes matters worse.

episodes.title: The Saudade of Fools, Parte 2
episodes.plot: When Hana is kidnapped, Michiko must go undercover as a bullfighter to thwart an old nemesis and rescue her friend.

episodes.title: The Rain That Falls in Monotone
episodes.plot: Michiko finds herself drawn to a handsome stranger, and Hana - in addition to feeling neglected - must tests her mettle in a showdown with a group of bullies.

episodes.title: Black Noise and a Dope Game
episodes.plot: Hana thinks she's found Satoshi, but Michiko's investigation reveals their target is nothing more than imposter. Unfortunately, the sadistic henchman watching their every move is the real deal.

episodes.title: The Chocolate Girl in Love
episodes.plot: Frustrated by Michiko's lifestyle, Hana ventures out on her own, where she meets a young circus performer who is hopelessly in love with an older man.

episodes.title: The Carnival of Hyenas
episodes.plot: A battered and beaten Michiko falls into the hands of Satoshi, who plans on handing her over to Atsuko. Could Michiko's journey end before she learns the truth about Hiroshi?

episodes.title: Starting Line Downpour
episodes.plot: Michiko finally tracks down Hana, but the young girl is unwilling to abandon her life with the circus. When the situation turns seedy, Michiko proves to be her only hope for escape.

episodes.title: 108 Degrees of Telepathic Purgatory
episodes.plot: When Michiko is stricken by a terrible fever, Hana does her best to care for her, but the high fees of a quack doctor prove to be heavy burden for the poor girl.

episodes.title: Goldfish of the Quagmire
episodes.plot: Atsuko struggles to adjust to her demotion until she meets a rebellious young girl who reminds her of Michiko - and all the times they shared together.

episodes.title: The Reckless Explosive Runner
episodes.plot: On top of a broken down motorcycle, Michiko must deal with a pair of hit men who've been hired to make sure her next breath - is the last she ever draws.

episodes.title: Aimless Graffiti
episodes.plot: Hana experiences an entirely new adventure when a boy named Lenine falls in love with her, but as is often the case, young love is not without its pitfalls.

episodes.title: Deep-Red Inconstant Etude
episodes.plot: Michiko believes she's closer than ever to a reunion with Hiroshi, but there's more than one surprise in store for her at the research facility where he once worked.

episodes.title: 18 Liters of Blood! A Heart-Pounding Opera
episodes.plot: Michiko is kidnapped by a gang of thugs, and Hana - aided by the assistance of a kindly stranger - must find a way to save her.

episodes.title: Akantareno Ballistic Samba
episodes.plot: Michiko is crushed by the news that Hiroshi never mentions her anymore, so Hana hatches a daring plan to cheer up her partner in crime!

episodes.title: A Butterfly of Impatient Shade
episodes.plot: Travel by train leads to a chaotic eruption of violence when Hana crosses paths with Satoshi - and Michiko finds herself face-to-face with Atsuko.

episodes.title: A Mass-Killing Rendezvous
episodes.plot: Separated from Michiko, Hana finds herself in the middle of a violent clash between Satoshi and his most sadistic and twisted henchman.

episodes.title: An Out-of-Season Last Waltz
episodes.plot: Hana and Satoshi fall into the hands of a gang of thugs, and Michiko finds herself in even more trouble with the law after a hostage situation goes horribly wrong.

episodes.title: Run with the Truth
episodes.plot: The adventure draws to a close as Michiko and Hana are finally reunited with Hiroshi, but not everything turns out as expected - and there are agonizing decisions yet to be made.
